title: I can't log into my account.
body:
I have had internet issues so when I did fiddle sticks the wifi USB I disconnected and I attempted to log back in the client says I didn't enter in the correct password so I logged into the forum and it works fine. 
Unfornetly I was in a ranked game I wish not to be barred for my attempts to log in to my account and failed. please help : Darkneveah

replies.body: I've been seeing more of this strange login issue, where players can sign in here but for some reason aren't able to login on the client. I don't have a 100% fix quite yet, but a lot of players have been able to get back on by grabbing the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a *Force Repatch*. Let me know if that works for you!
Same for me, today there are problems.
I do recall the client saying it went back to older version and now is finally installing it again......
